version_description:
We continue improving our playback experience.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at podcasts@evolve.xyz. We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

You've spoken, we've listened. We are releasing two of our most requested features: faster listening (1.2x-2x) and a sleep timer. To use either of these features, tap on the player bar and you'll see them on the full screen player. May you podfaster and have sweet dreams!

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcastapp.io. We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

With this update, it's easier to know if your favorite shows have new episodes. Each favorite show will have a yellow sign which says "New Episodes". Hope you like it!

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at podcasts@evolve.xyz. We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

We've redesigned the main screen for each show!

New features include:
- Listen to episodes in one tap, by pressing on their logos on the left.
- Start listening to a show from the beginning, by scrolling downwards and tapping on the "Go to first episode" button.
- Discover new shows related to the one you are currently listening to, with the "Related" section.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcastapp.io. We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

The Podcast App now supports many more languages: Danish, Dutch, German, French, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese, Russian and Swedish.

Your shows in the Favorites section have a new layout. You can now see many more of them at a glance, figure out if they have new episodes and also reorder them more easily. Hope you like it!

Hey there, loyal users!

We are introducing a couple of things in this new version:
• You can now resume listening to your favorite shows a lot faster (with just one tap) by using our new "Continue Listening" section. Hope you like it!
• Voice Over now works with your list of favorite shows.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcastapp.io. We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

We are happy to introduce our newest feature: personalized show recommendations. Go to the discover section, and you'll see recommended shows just for you.

UPDATE WITH NPR SHOWS FIX
Due to a recent error on feeds provided by NPR Network, all their shows were having several issues. They have since fixed the bug on their side and this release includes a fix to reflect that change on our app.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming!
Please email us at help@podcast.app.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

In this release, we are making improvements to the navigation of the app:
- In "My Podcasts", you'll be able to navigate more easily between Favorites and Listen Later, with a swipe left or right.
- We now have a new section called "Latest", with a real-time feed of the latest episodes from your favorite shows.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcast.app We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

In this release, we are launching Apple CarPlay support to improve your experience with The Podcast App while driving.

Please go out, try it and send us your feedback to help@podcast.app. It's super valuable for us to create the best experience for you.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

In this release, we are launching User Accounts support to improve your experience with The Podcast App. Go to “My Podcasts” find the avatar icon on the top-right corner and create your account to save your podcasts and listening progress.

Please go out, try it and send us your feedback to help@podcast.app. It's super valuable for us to create the best experience for you.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

As a way of helping people navigate the unique situation the world is going through, we've created playlists with some of the best podcasts we've found on topics like working from home effectively, managing worry and anxiety as well as entertaining the little ones. You'll find them by tapping the yellow message in any of the main screens of the app. If there's any topic you'd like us to cover or have any feedback about the episode selection, please let us know.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcast.app We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)

Hey there, loyal users!

We are introducing a fix to a bug in our latest release. To those who experienced it, we are really sorry and we thank you for your patience!

Also: as a way of helping people navigate the unique situation the world is going through, we've created playlists with some of the best podcasts we've found on topics like working from home effectively, managing worry and anxiety as well as entertaining the little ones. You'll find them by tapping the yellow message in any of the main screens of the app. If there's any topic you'd like us to cover or have any feedback about the episode selection, please let us know.

Your feedback makes The Podcast App better. Keep it coming! Please email us at help@podcast.app We read it all.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful for us. If you think The Podcast App is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)
